attributes.action: Remove the Defence Secretary, Des Brown from his post because of his attempt, via the Courts to gag Coroners from criticising Ministry of Defence failures resulting in British military personnel losing their lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This action by a Minister of State is an affront to all families who have lost loved ones in the service of their country. The courts must be independent from government, otherwise we will exist (not live) in an Orwellian nightmare

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
